name: Doctor Droid
headline: Your best friend in production.
description:
Doctor Droid is an automated diagnosis and troubleshooting assistant for engineering teams.

Doctor Droid integrates with your existing monitoring stack (10+ tools supported) and assists with automated diagnosis, troubleshooting recommendations and more. 

Get started

To get an automated report on the state of alerting & noise in your company, try out our free report generator today -- https://drdroid.io/doctor-droid-slack-integration

founders.name: Siddarth Jain, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CEO at Doctor Droid. 

Previously investor at Accel, Data Scientist & Chief of Staff at Shadowfax. Studied Electrical Engineering from IIT Delhi

founders.name: Dipesh Mittal, Founder
founders.description:
Founder and architect of Doctor Droid, building on 10 years in software engineering across logistics (Shadowfax), healthcare (Labstreet) and fintech (Paypal).
Personally a big fan of science & fantasy fiction, enjoy cycling and traveling to historical monuments.

# Acknowledge & Triage 100% of your alerts in less than 1 minute
**Doctor Droid is an AI teammate that continuously monitors your alerts, and investigates issues by integrating with**** _your monitoring tools_**** & understanding your company's context **_(Playbooks)_
[Request Access](https://drdroid.io/<https:/calendly.com/siddarthjain/doctor-droid-discovery-call>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/642ad9ebc00f957a9c9b1af9_bg-blue-image.png)

### 40+ Integrations across the stack
[Explore integrations](https://drdroid.io/<https:/drdroid.io/integrations>)
# Unlock the Power of AI Agent with Doctor Droid
## Empower your engineering team with smarter, faster, and automated issue resolution workflows.
#### Faster Issue Resolution
Accelerate troubleshooting with AI-powered root cause analysis and data automation.
#### AI-Powered Assistance
Let Doctor Droid analyze, search, and act, so your engineers can focus on solving problems.
#### Seamless Collaboration
Assign tasks intelligently based on past incidents and team availability.
#### Actionable Insights
Learn from past incidents with real-time dashboards and automation recommendations.
#### Automated Reporting
Save hours with instant incident reports, postmortems, and SOP updates.
[Read how it works](https://drdroid.io/<https:/docs.drdroid.io/>)
# Discover the Full Power of Doctor Droid
## Explore the four key capabilities that make Doctor Droid your ultimate troubleshooting assistant.
### Investigation Insights
Quickly analyze data across tools to find the root cause and suggest fixes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Connects to logs, databases, and monitoring tools for seamless data analysis.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Identifies the impact of issues and provides actionable recommendations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/67518184ff70f3c59f110db7_Remove%20false%20positives.png)
### Intelligent Assignment
Automatically assign tasks to the right person without delays or confusion.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Uses past tickets, on-call schedules, and escalation policies for intelligent task assignment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Reduces response times by eliminating manual coordination.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/6787bee8832d36673f86b260_Intelligent%20Assesment%20.png)
### Real-Time Assistance
Get real-time insights and recommendations during troubleshooting.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Searches logs, SOPs, and past incidents to provide relevant solutions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Looks up external forums and knowledge bases to suggest diagnoses and fixes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/6787bed92e778719ccdd2add_Assistance.png)
### Automated Introspection
Learn and improve from every incident with automated insights.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Creates detailed postmortem reports and updates SOPs automatically.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Analyzes patterns in past incidents to suggest preventative measures.
# Trusted by Teams Like Yours
## See how Doctor Droid has helped teams resolve issues faster and with less effort.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/65ae9239b9f73a44d2a427d6_image%20\(3\)%20\(1\).png)
_This tool has proven instrumental in offering valuable insights into our alerts, aiding us in prioritizing important ones and_ _minimizing unnecessary noise_ _._
#### Onkar Kore
##### Senior Principal Engineer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b4b0baf0c82fe1a0aa61e6/65b4b653228c0c1045b9d1d9_6-ezgif.com-avif-to-png-converter-modified.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/65ae8ec1b64aab663046d92e_image%20\(2\).png)
 _The analysis is_ _empowering our engineering_** _team_** _to make informed decisions promptly. Overall, a great addition to our toolkit for improving efficiency and staying ahead of potential issues._
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b4b0baf0c82fe1a0aa61e6/65b4b728a8058948c0c51bfe_9-modified.png)

The tool's user-friendly interface and seamless integration have streamlined our workflow. The Doctor Droid team has been exceptionally helpful, providing excellent support and ensuring a smooth experience. Overall, a great addition to our toolkit for improving efficiency and staying ahead of potential issues._
# Let AI do the troubleshooting, free up your engineers.

# Unlock the Power of AI Agent with Doctor Droid
## Empower your engineering team with smarter, faster, and automated issue resolution workflows.
#### Faster Issue Resolution
Accelerate troubleshooting with AI-powered root cause analysis and data automation.
#### AI-Powered Assistance
Let Doctor Droid analyze, search, and act, so your engineers can focus on solving problems.
#### Seamless Collaboration
Assign tasks intelligently based on past incidents and team availability.
#### Actionable Insights
Learn from past incidents with real-time dashboards and automation recommendations.
#### Automated Reporting
Save hours with instant incident reports, postmortems, and SOP updates.
Read how it works⟨19⟩
# Discover the Full Power of Doctor Droid
## Explore the four key capabilities that make Doctor Droid your ultimate troubleshooting assistant.
### Investigation Insights
Quickly analyze data across tools to find the root cause and suggest fixes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Connects to logs, databases, and monitoring tools for seamless data analysis.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Identifies the impact of issues and provides actionable recommendations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/67518184ff70f3c59f110db7_Remove%20false%20positives.png)
### Intelligent Assignment
Automatically assign tasks to the right person without delays or confusion.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Uses past tickets, on-call schedules, and escalation policies for intelligent task assignment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Reduces response times by eliminating manual coordination.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/6787bee8832d36673f86b260_Intelligent%20Assesment%20.png)
### Real-Time Assistance
Get real-time insights and recommendations during troubleshooting.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Searches logs, SOPs, and past incidents to provide relevant solutions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Looks up external forums and knowledge bases to suggest diagnoses and fixes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/6787bed92e778719ccdd2add_Assistance.png)
### Automated Introspection
Learn and improve from every incident with automated insights.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Creates detailed postmortem reports and updates SOPs automatically.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/642ad9ebc00f9544d49b1a6b/64e610fa6702685dac066777_check.svg)
Analyzes patterns in past incidents to suggest preventative measures.

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Doctor Droid

**Founded:** 2022  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Team Size:** 6 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  
**Group Partner:** Nicolas Dessaigne  

---

#### Mission
Doctor Droid aims to be "Your best friend in production," focusing on reducing alert noise and enhancing overall operational efficiency for engineering teams.

---

### Product Offerings
Initially launched as an automated diagnosis and troubleshooting assistant for engineering teams, Doctor Droid has evolved to integrate seamlessly with your existing monitoring stack, supporting over 10 tools. Key functionalities include:

- **Real-Time Alert Noise Reduction:** Minimizes unnecessary alerts to focus on what's truly critical.
- **Alert Intelligence:** Provides smart suggestions to manage alerts effectively.
- **PlayBooks:** Customizable guides for troubleshooting based on company-specific contexts.
- **AI Ops:** Implements AI-powered incident resolution strategies.
- **Incident Intelligence:** Analyzes incidents to derive insights and improve future responses.

### Key Features
1. **Investigation Insights:** Quickly analyze extensive data across tools to identify root causes and remedies.
2. **Intelligent Assignment:** Automate task allocation based on team availability and historical ticket data.
3. **Real-Time Assistance:** Access actionable insights during the troubleshooting process.
4. **Automated Introspection:** Generate detailed postmortems and update SOPs automatically, facilitating continuous learning.

---

### Community and Resources
Doctor Droid engages with a community of engineers, allowing users to share experiences and insights through its Slack community. Additionally, they offer various resources such as documentation, integrations, and a blog to spread knowledge and best practices.

### How to Get Started
Interested teams can explore their free report generator at [Doctor Droid’s website](https://drdroid.io/) to assess alert noise and alert states in their company. 

---

### Testimonials
Doctor Droid has garnered positive feedback from its users, such as:

- **Onkar Kore, Senior Principal Engineer:** Praised the tool for prioritizing alerts and minimizing noise.
- **Rishabh Singh, Staff Software Engineer:** Highlighted its effectiveness in enabling informed decision-making.

---

### Conclusion
If you're part of an engineering team dealing with alert fatigue, Doctor Droid stands out as a comprehensive solution designed to streamline monitoring and incident response through powerful automation. With its tools, your engineers can finally focus on solving problems instead of drowning in alerts. 

For detailed insights and features, visit their [website](https://drdroid.io/).
